series: The Western Australian explorers' diaries project, incorporating the historical records of Western Australia
title: The journal of the Brockman Droving Expedition of 1874-75 to the north west of Western Australia
subjects: Frontier and pioneer life -- Western Australia
by_statement: edited by Nan Broad with Peter Bridge ; with an introduction on the origins of the expedition and the fate of the Clarkson brothers by Nan Broad.

notes.value:
Substantially, the journal of John Brockman.

Includes bibliographical references (p. 137).
